headline: 3 Top Dividend Stocks I Just Bought as the Stock Market Corrected
summary: Stock market corrections (a decline of 10% or more from the recent high) can be a gift to dividend-seeking investors.  As stock prices fall, dividend yields rise, enabling investors to lock in higher yields on many top dividend stocks.  Among those I recently purchased were Blackstone (NYSE: BX), Starbucks (NASDAQ: SBUX), and Verizon (NYSE: VZ).

headline: Blackstone Raises An $8 Billion Fund To Invest In Commercial Real Estate To Buy Debt Portfolios From Banks And Insurance Companies
summary: Private equity juggernaut Blackstone (NYSE:BX) has matched its own record for a commercial real-estate debt fund by closing on a $8 billion deal. It’s a further indication of the sector’s rebound, The Wall Street Journal reported. In a company ...
